member.name: IMFTimedTextFormattedText.GetSubformatting
member.summary: Gets a subformat in the formatted timed-text object.
member.param: The index of the subformat in the formatted timed-text object.
A pointer to a variable that receives the first character of the subformat.
A pointer to a variable that receives the length, in characters, of the subformat.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the subformat's timed-text style. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextFormattedText.GetSubformattingCount
member.summary: Gets the number of subformats in the formatted timed-text object.

member.name: IMFTimedTextFormattedText.GetText
member.summary: Gets the text in the formatted timed-text object.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the text.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextFormattedText
member.summary: Represents a block of formatted timed-text.
